content:
During the last day, the Aviation of Defense forces has struck 2 points of management and 8 areas of personnel concentration, weapons and enemy military equipment.

About thisreportedThe General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Divisions of rocket troops have led to:

  • 1 Anti -air defense agent,
  • 1 artillery tool,
  • 1 composition of enemy ammunition.

Our warriors continue to be active in the occupation troops of losses in living strength and equipment, depleting the enemy along the entire line of combat collision.

As reportedArmyinform, in the last day in the Novopavlovsky direction 26 attacks were reflected, in total 67 combatants took place on the front.
title: The Armed Forces defeated the air defense agent and the composition of enemy ammunition
description: This was reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Divisions of rocket troops were struck ...
author: Army Inform
